content.webTitle: CD: Bonde do Role, With Lasers

fields.headline: Bonde do Role, With Lasers
fields.bodyText: The baile funk trio from Curitiba, Brazil - championed previously in OMM ('Flash Forward', OMM43) - may be hooked on the kind of cheesy riffs last served warmed-over by the Darkness, the beats might sound as if they were scavenged from a scrapyard, and you might not be able to understand a word (which might be good news: one track details a most unhygienic sex act). But Bonde Do Role are even better than that suggests: each of the 13 tracks here is dangerously infectious - party music for this long hot summer that seems already to have started.
